name: effect-v3-to-v4
description: Migrate Effect codebases from v3 to v4

scripts.test: npm run typecheck && sh -c 'set -eu; for spec in typescript:./tests/typescript tsx:./tests/tsx javascript:./tests/javascript typescript:./tests/idempotency/typescript tsx:./tests/idempotency/tsx javascript:./tests/idempotency/javascript; do lang=${spec%%:*}; dir=${spec#*:}; EFFECT_V4_MODE=aggressive npx codemod@latest jssg test -l "$lang" ./scripts/codemod.ts "$dir"; done'
